Title: An early look at Containers: Windows Server 2016, Hyper-V and Azure with Mark Russinovich
Summary: On the season premiere of Microsoft Mechanics, we demo the new container technology within Windows Server 2016, including a hands-on look at Hyper-V Containers and upcoming milestones for Azure, with Azure CTO Mark Russinovich.
Content:
On the season premiere of Microsoft Mechanics, we demo the new container technology within Windows Server 2016, including a hands-on look at Hyper-V Containers and upcoming milestones for Azure, with Azure CTO Mark Russinovich.

Mark demonstrates the new native container technology in Windows Server 2016, including Hyper-V Containers on Nano Server and discusses how you can manage and run containers in Windows Server, on-premises or in Azure and within heterogeneous environments with Linux.

If you are an IT Professional new to containers, the show offers more perspective on the design and architecture of containers, your options and the main advantages. You can also try it for yourself today.
